mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE VALUES (ATTENDANCE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SYSTIMESTAMP, NULL, #{emp_no}, NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET ATT_END = SYSTIMESTAMP WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND ATT_START BETWEEN ATT_START AND (SELECT SYSTIMESTAMP FROM DUAL) AND TO_CHAR(ATT_START, 'DD') = (SELECT EXTRACT(DAY FROM SYSTIMESTAMP) FROM DUAL)
mapper.select: SELECT ATT_NO, TO_CHAR(ATT_START, 'HH24:MI') ATT_START, TO_CHAR(ATT_END, 'HH24:MI') ATT_END, EMP_NO, ATT_WORKTIME FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND ATT_START BETWEEN ATT_START AND (SELECT SYSTIMESTAMP FROM DUAL) AND TO_CHAR(ATT_START, 'DD') = (SELECT EXTRACT(DAY FROM SYSDATE) FROM DUAL)

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT ATT_NO, TO_CHAR(ATT_START, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') ATT_START, TO_CHAR(ATT_END, 'HH24:MI') ATT_END, EMP_NO, ATT_WORKTIME FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND ATT_START BETWEEN ATT_START AND (SELECT SYSTIMESTAMP FROM DUAL) AND TO_CHAR(ATT_START, 'MM') = (SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) FROM DUAL) ORDER BY ATT_NO DESC ) A
